byline.original: By JEFF ZELENY and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Gov. Chris Christie’s endorsement added to the sense that establishment Republicans are rallying around Mitt Romney as their best hope at retaking the White House.
snippet: Gov. Chris Christie’s endorsement added to the sense that establishment Republicans are rallying around Mitt Romney as their best hope at retaking the White House.

headline.main: Christie Endorses Romney Ahead of Debate
